name: Cassiel's Quest
description:
Greedy businessmen have stolen the Crystals of Wealth from Heaven's vault! Now Cassiel, angel of temperance, must fight them to retrieve the crystals and protect earth from eternal sin!

A bullet heaven shoot 'em up auto scroller by Team That Thing:

-Edo (music and sfx)

-Eylon (programming)

-Idan (programming, art and sfx)

-Yonatan (art)

Made for the Krass N.G. 6 Game Jam.

Theme: "A game where you collect crystals from heaven with businessmen "
